responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! How may I help you?

patterns: How much money do I have?
responses: You can check your balance via our mobile app or by calling customer service.

patterns: How do I open an account?
responses: You can open an account online or visit your nearest branch with ID proof.

patterns: How do I close my account?
I want to close my account
responses: To close your account, please visit your nearest branch or contact support.
You can transfer money using our mobile app, net banking, or at an ATM.
Please check your internet connection or contact support if the issue persists.

patterns: How do I get my account statement?
responses: You can download your statement from the mobile app or request one at the branch.

patterns: How do I apply for a loan?
responses: You can apply for a loan on our website or visit a branch for assistance.

patterns: What credit cards do you offer?
responses: We offer different types of credit cards. Visit our website for more details.

patterns: How do I increase my credit limit?
responses: You can request a credit limit increase via the mobile app or customer support.

patterns: How do I report a lost debit card?
responses: Please call our helpline immediately to block your card and request a replacement.

patterns: I think my account was hacked
responses: If you suspect fraud, contact our fraud department immediately at our helpline.

patterns: How do I change my password?
responses: You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' option on our website.

patterns: How do I talk to a representative?
responses: You can call our 24/7 customer support at 1800-XXX-XXXX or visit a branch.
